src: Hello, I'm Chen Jie.What's your name?
tgt: 你好，我是陈洁。你叫什么名字？

src: I have a ruler. Me too! I have a pencil. Me too! I have a crayon. Me too! I have an eraser. Me too!
tgt: 我有一把尺子。我也有！我有一支铅笔。我也有！我有一支蜡笔。我也有！我有一块橡皮擦。我也有！

src: Hello, I'm Mike. What's your name?
tgt: 你好，我叫迈克，你叫什么名字？

src: Open your pencil box. Show me your pen. Close your book. Carry your bag.
tgt: 打开你的铅笔盒。给我看看你的钢笔。合上你的书。背上你的书包。

src: Hello, Sarah! Do, oh, do. Hello, John! Do, oh, do.，Sarah! Hello, Mike! Hello! Hello! Hello!
tgt: 你好，萨拉!做，哦，做。你好，约翰!做，哦，做。你好，迈克!做，哦，做。你好，你好，你好！
琼斯先生，这是格林小姐。

src: Show me green. Show me red. Show me blue. Show me yellow.
tgt: 给我看绿色。给我看红色。给我看蓝色。给我看黄色。
听一听，重复读并唱一唱

src: one d dog, tow c cat,three b brown,four c crayon,five d duck
tgt: 1 d 狗，2 c 猫，3 b 棕色的，4 c 蜡笔，5 d 鸭子

src: Good afternoon,Chen Jie. This is Zoom.
Hello,Zoom!This is Zip.Nice to meet you.
tgt: 你好，佐姆!这是热普。很高兴见到你。

src: Black, black. Stand up. Orange, orange. Sit down. White, white. Touch the ground. Brown, brown. Turn around.
tgt: 黑色，黑色，站起。橙色，橙色，坐下。白色，白色。触摸地板。棕色，棕色。转圈。
听一听，并打钩或者打叉

src: Red and yellow and pink and green, Purple and orange and blue. I can sing a rainbow, sing a rainbow, Sing a rainbow now.
tgt: 红色，黄色，粉红色和绿色，紫色，橙色和蓝色。我能唱彩虹歌，唱彩虹歌，现在唱彩虹歌.

src: A red flower.A yellow flower.A blue flower...
tgt: 一朵红色的花。一朵黄色的花。一朵蓝色的花……

src: I'm fine, thank you.Let's go to school!
tgt: 我很好，谢谢你。我们去上学吧！

src: Hello! Hello! Hello! Hello! How are you? How are you? I'm fine, thank you. I'm fine, thank you. How are you? How are you?
tgt: 你好！你好！你好！你好！你好吗？你好吗？  很好，谢谢你。  很好，谢谢你。你好吗？你好吗？

src: Look at me! This is my face.
Close your eyes. Open your mouth. Touch youe nose. Touch your ear. Touch your face.
tgt: 闭上你的眼镜。张开你的嘴巴。摸你的鼻子。摸你的耳朵。摸你的脸。
听一听，重复读并唱一唱

src: Clap your hands. Touch your head. Wave your arms. Shake your legs. Shake your body. Stamp your foot.
tgt: 拍手。摸头。挥舞手臂。晃动腿。晃动身体。跺脚。
鼻子 腿 手 嘴巴
身体 耳朵 脚 手臂
眼睛 嘴巴 身体

src: Head and shoulders, knees and toes. Head and shoulders, knees and toes, knees and toes. Head and shoulders, knees and toes, knees and toes. Eyes and ears and mouth and nose. Head and shoulders, knees and toes, knees and toes.
tgt: 头和肩膀，膝盖和脚趾头和肩膀，膝盖和脚趾，膝盖和脚趾。头和肩膀，膝盖和脚趾，膝盖和脚趾。眼睛、耳朵、嘴和鼻子。头和肩膀，膝盖和脚趾，膝盖和脚趾。

src: Look! An arm and a leg. 看！
Good morning. I’m Chen Jie. This is Sarah.
tgt: 早上好。我是陈洁。这是萨拉

src: Go up the ladders.Go down the snakes.
tgt: 顺着梯子爬上去。顺着蛇爬下来。
搭配，写一写并大声朗读。

src: Hello! Mike. Hello, Chen Jie. Hello, hello! How are you? This is Mary. This is Willy. Nice to meet you. How are you? I’m fine. I’m fine. Thank you, thank you very much. I’m fine. I’m fine. Thank you, thank you very much.
tgt: 你好！麦克。你好，陈杰。你好，你好！你好吗？这是玛丽。这是威利。很高兴见到你。你好吗？我很好。我很好。谢谢你，非常感谢你。我很好。我很好。谢谢你，非常感谢你。

src: Look at the cat. It is fat. Look at the pig. It is big. Look at the dog. It's on the log. Look at the duck. It's in the truck. Look at the bear. It's on the pear.
tgt: 看这只猫。它很胖。看这头猪。它很大。看这只狗。它在原木上。看这只鸭子。它在卡车里。看这只熊。它在梨上。
听一听，重复读并唱一唱

src: Act like an elephant. Act like a bird. Act like a tiger. Act like a monkey. Act like a panda.
tgt: 扮演一只大象。  扮演一只鸟。扮演一只老虎。  扮演一只猴子。  扮演一只熊猫。

src: Hello, Dog! Follow Pig. Follow me!
Hello, Duck! Follow Zoom. Follow Pig. Follow me!
tgt: 你好，鸭子！跟着佐姆。跟着猪。跟着我！

src: Hello,Rabbit! Follow Zoom. Follow Pig. Follow Dog. Follow me!
tgt: 你好，兔子！跟着佐姆。跟着猪。  跟着狗。跟着我！
我有一个胡萝卜。跟着我！

src: Here you are.Have some bread, too.
